conversation.text: For a light-hearted recommendation, I suggest "Fast Times at Ridgemont High" (1982). This film features a group of high school students enjoying their time with sex, drugs, and rock 'n' roll. Starring James Russo, Amanda Wyss, and Taylor Negron among others, it's an entertaining look at teenage life during that era.
